mean_cn: n.（社会性、政治性）活动，运动；  v.从事活动
mean_en: a series of planned activities that are intended to achieve a particular social, commercial or political aim
sentence: Many people launched a campaign to call for environmental protection.
sentence_trans: 许多人发起了一场呼吁环保的运动。
word_etyma: camp营地 + aign名词后缀 → 营地 → 战役
